CustomField.description: ** Conditionally Required ** Link to the related Payment Method on file for the subscribing customer - used for automatic payment charges. Required if the parent Subscription Plan "Require Payment Method" field is checked.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: ** Conditionally Required ** Link to the related Payment Method on file for the subscribing customer - used for automatic payment charges. Required if the parent Subscription Plan "Require Payment Method" field is checked.
CustomField.label: Payment Method
